body_html:
The pip command you typed asks for a tensorflow package and a second specific package via a download URL.

Please double check your command against the ones in the instructions here: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac

i.e. use either
pip install --upgrade tensorflow
or
pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.0-py2-none-any.whl

Please reopen if this doesn't solve your problem
body_text:
The pip command you typed asks for a tensorflow package and a second specific package via a download URL.
Please double check your command against the ones in the instructions here: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac
i.e. use either
pip install --upgrade tensorflow
or
pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.0-py2-none-any.whl

body:
The `pip` command you typed asks for a `tensorflow` package **and** a second specific package via a download URL.

Please double check your command against the ones in the instructions here: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac

i.e. use either 
`pip install --upgrade tensorflow`
or
`pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.0-py2-none-any.whl`

Please reopen if this doesn't solve your problem
